post:
**About My Custom Hosting**

My Custom Hosting was registered back in 2009 and provided hosting only to customers known to the business in real life.  With almost 8 years experience in the hosting industry you should feel right at home with My Custom Hosting.  We aim to offer your the most features at the lowest price possible.  With multiple offsite backup locations, CloudFlare, Softaculous and Nginx+Varnish, and now Self Managed VPS, we feel we are almost there but if you have any suggestions to a feature we should add to our line-up please let us know!

**Limited Time**:  Free upgrade offer applies to the next **5** customers only!  Get yours while they last!!!

**Special VPS**: [Order Link](https://billing.mycustomhosting.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=7) **Cost**:  $7/mth

* <del>40</del> 60 GB Disk Space (SSD Cached) - Get 50% More! Open A Ticket After Ordering For Upgrade!
- <del>400</del> 600 GB Data Transfer - Get 50% More! Open A Ticket After Ordering For Upgrade!
- <del>2</del> 3 Gb Guaranteed RAM (no vSwap or Burst RAM) - Get 50% More! Open A Ticket After Ordering For Upgrade!
- 1 IPv4 Address
- Fair usage of <del>2</del> 3 cores - Get 50% More! Open A Ticket After Ordering For Upgrade!
- OpenVZ
* Lenoir, North Carolina

***

**128MB VPS**: [Order Link](https://billing.mycustomhosting.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=9) **Cost**:  $20/yr

* <del>5</del> 10 Gb Disk Space (SSD Cached) - Doubled!! Open A Ticket After Ordering For Upgrade!
* <del>50</del> 75 Gb Data Transfer - Get 50% More! Open A Ticket After Ordering For Upgrade!
* <del>128</del> 192 Mb Guaranteed RAM (no vSwap or Burst RAM) - Get 50% More! Open A Ticket After Ordering For Upgrade!
* 1 IPv4 Address
* Fair usage of <del>2</del> 3 cores - Get 50% More! Open A Ticket After Ordering For Upgrade!
* OpenVZ
* Lenoir, North Carolina

***

**256MB VPS**:  [Order Link](https://billing.mycustomhosting.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=8)  **Cost**:  $4/mth

* <del>10</del> 20 Gb Disk Space (SSD Cached) - Doubled!! Open A Ticket After Ordering For Upgrade!
* <del>100</del> 150 Gb Data Transfer - Get 50% More! Open A Ticket After Ordering For Upgrade!
* <del>256</del> 384 Mb Guaranteed RAM (no vSwap or Burst RAM) - Get 50% More! Open A Ticket After Ordering For Upgrade!
* 1 IPv4 Address
* Fair usage of <del>2</del> 3 cores - Get 50% More! Open A Ticket After Ordering For Upgrade!
* OpenVZ
* Lenoir, North Carolina

**Note**:  You will get **all** the upgrades.  Not just one or another.  You get the RAM, Disk, Transfer and Core upgrade!!!

**Location**:  All VPS are hosted in Lenoir, North Carolina, at the Dacentec facility.
